title: Vending machines : sales volume of vended products 2010
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Vended volume (in billion U.S. dollars), containing a total of 12 data points.
Overall Vended volume (in billion U.S. dollars) has increased over the Year.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Vended volume (in billion U.S. dollars), of value 47.5 was reached at Year 2007
Minimum Vended volume (in billion U.S. dollars) about 36.6 was reached at Year 1999
